maintenanceAgency.agencyName: SNAC: Social Networks and Archival Context

maintenanceEvent.eventDescription: Republish: User canceled edit without making changes

source.sourceEntry: First Record Book of Births and Deaths of Members of Evesham Monthly Meeting, via Ancestry.com search, January 20, 2021

descriptiveNote.p: p. 10. Esther Warrington was Born the 20th of the 10th Month 1743; daughter of Henry Warrington, who came from Old England about the 12th year of his age in the Year 1700; by his Second Wife Elizabeth, daughter of Thomas and Elizabeth Bishop of North-Hampton.

source.sourceEntry: Hunt, John, “Our Beloved Friend” : The Journals of John Hunt, 1770-1824, 2018

descriptiveNote.p: p. vi. The oldest son of Robert and Abigail Hunt of Haddonfield Monthly Meeting, John was born in August of 1740.... He and Esther Warrington, daughter of Henry and Elizabeth (Bishop) Warrington, were married on March 17, 1763, under the care of Evesham Monthly Meeting.

source.sourceEntry: Record of births and burials for Chester Monthly Meeting, begun 7th month 1804, via Ancestry.com search, January 21, 2021

descriptiveNote.p: p. 22. John Hunt born 5th of 6th month 1740 and Esther his wife born 20th of 10th month 1743. Esther Hunt deceased the 9 month 15th 1844, interred the 17th at Moorestown.

source.sourceEntry: Evesham Monthly Meeting First Book of Marriages, via Ancestry.com search, January 20, 2021

descriptiveNote.p: p. 22. John Hunt, son of Robert Hunt, and Esther Warrington, daughter of Henry Warrington, were married on the Seventeenth Day of ye 3d month 1763

biogHist.p: Esther Warrington Hunt was a Quaker woman who lived in New Jersey. She was born to Henry Warrington and his second wife Elizabeth Bishop Warrington on December 20, 1743 (o.s.). On March 17, 1763, she married John Hunt.
